Firstly, I know I'm not suppose to post right now cause i'm guessing its opened for the 2 others applications, but I can't stand what i play and see.


1) What position are you applying for?  Moderator / Admin

3) Where do you live? (Country, time zone):  Canada (Ontario) , EST 

4) Current In-Game Name:  炎Flame炎

6) Email Address:  REDACTED@REDACTED 

7) How long have you been involved (frequent player, moderator, donator, admin) with [NNJG] or Shadow's TTT/Flood/Jail/ server:  a month give or take some days/weeks 

8) What you can bring to the [NNJG] Team (Web/Graphic Design, Lua/other Coder, Moderation, Map Maker, ect.)? Moderation in CS:S and TTT and JailMod

9) Why do you want to be part of the [NNJG]Team?  Honestly, I care only about looking after the TTT server and CS:S server, but like i started playing your JailMod server and holy crap.... so much freekilling/mic spamming/ and so on. 

10 ) Any GMOD/TF2/CSS experience:  None. (I played CS 1.6 most of my life) 

11) Have you ever owned a GMOD/TF2/CSS server?  Never 

12) Do you have a microphone? Do you frequently use it?  Yes, I have a microphone and I think I often use it. 

13) Any other Comments or information you can provide:  What the flip is with these servers? I see guards Free Killing massively on my first day coming to jailbreak.
